name: storage_folders_insert
description: Creates a new folder. Only applicable to buckets with hierarchical namespace enabled.

bucket.description: Name of the bucket in which the folder resides.

recursive.description: If true, any parent folder which doesnâ€™t exist will be created automatically.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

Folder.description: A folder. Only available in buckets with hierarchical namespace enabled.

bucket.description: The name of the bucket containing this folder.

createTime.description: The creation time of the folder in RFC 3339 format.

id.description: The ID of the folder, including the bucket name, folder name.

kind.description: The kind of item this is. For folders, this is always storage#folder.

metageneration.description: The version of the metadata for this folder. Used for preconditions and for detecting changes in metadata.

name.description: The name of the folder. Required if not specified by URL parameter.

pendingRenameInfo.description: Only present if the folder is part of an ongoing rename folder operation. Contains information which can be used to query the operation status.

operationId.description: The ID of the rename folder operation.

updateTime.description: The modification time of the folder metadata in RFC 3339 format.

$block: A folder. Only available in buckets with hierarchical namespace enabled.

$ul: **bucket**: The name of the bucket containing this folder.
**createTime**: The creation time of the folder in RFC 3339 format.
**id**: The ID of the folder, including the bucket name, folder name.
**kind**: The kind of item this is. For folders, this is always storage#folder. (default: storage#folder)
**metageneration**: The version of the metadata for this folder. Used for preconditions and for detecting changes in metadata.
**name**: The name of the folder. Required if not specified by URL parameter.
**pendingRenameInfo**: Only present if the folder is part of an ongoing rename folder operation. Contains information which can be used to query the operation status.
**operationId**: The ID of the rename folder operation.
**updateTime**: The modification time of the folder metadata in RFC 3339 format.
